resources.string: TWO super ENTHUSIASTIC fifteen-year-olds during the PANDEMIC who had a lot of time in their hands, decided to pursue their interest in CS. They have now developed that interest into something bigger. GreenLeafz is a LEAF CLASSIFIER designed to sort plants with just a picture of its leaves. It is written in a PYTHON package called TENSORFLOW and brought to you in the form of an ANDROID App we developed in JAVA.
